snippet: Rescuers with the New York Air National Guard recently underwent training in animal care at Long Island Veterinary Specialists.
abstract: Rescuers with the New York Air National Guard undergo training in animal care at Long Island Veterinary Specialists facility, learning how to treat dogs in combat settings; military dogs are increasingly playing crucial roles in operations in Iraq and Afghanistan, making the need for expertise in quickly tending to wounder or sick animals imperative.
lead_paragraph: Rescuers with the New York Air National Guard recently underwent training in animal care at Long Island Veterinary Specialists.

headline.seo: At a Long Island Animal Hospital, Learning How to Treat Military Dogs
headline.main: A Lesson for Paramedics: How to Treat Dogs Who Work in a War Zone
headline.print_headline: A Lesson for Paramedics: How to Treat Dogs Who Work in a War Zone
